original_text: And the destruction of the transgressors and of the sinners shall be together, and they that forsake the Lord shall be consumed.
korean_text: 그러나 패역한 자와 죄인은 함께 패망하고 여호와를 버린 자도 멸망할 것이라

sentences.original_text: And the destruction of the transgressors
and of the sinners shall be together
and they that forsake the Lord
